findings.title: Burn amount is sending by _transferStandard function
findings.description: The burn amount is sent using the _transferStandard function which operates with only reflection balance, potentially leading to issues if burn or sending addresses are excluded from the reward.

findings.title: Out of Gas Exception in includeInReward() Function
findings.description: The function includeInReward() uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long.

findings.title: Out of Gas Exception in _getCurrentSupply Function
findings.description: The function _getCurrentSupply uses a loop to evaluate total supply and may be aborted with an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to the block gas limit.
